messages.subject: Re: Ezine of unschooling & mindfulparenting
messages.msgSnippet: ... Hey, Joanne! It was soo good to meet you face to face!  We had a great time, and Liam and I agreed that the thing ended way too soon (even sooner for
messages.messageBody:
> I went to the link provided in the conference material
> for "Connections" (see subject line above) but am not getting
> connected. Can anyone provide the link again?
>

Hey, Joanne!

It was soo good to meet you face to face! We had a great time, and
Liam and I agreed that the thing ended way too soon (even sooner for
'cause we had to bug outta there so early to get to a gig early on
Sunday afternoon back here in NY). Anyway, try this link for
Connections (it just worked for me):

http://connections.organiclearning.org/

I hope you're well, and I hope I get to see you again soon especially
since we really live so close by!

Warmly,

Marji, who's missing everyone very, very much already!!

messages.subject: Ezine of unschooling & mindfulparenting
messages.msgSnippet: We just got back last night from the Northeast Unschooling Conference. It was our first time a conference.  Anyone who has never gone, I HIGHLY recommend
messages.messageBody:
We just got back last night from the Northeast Unschooling Conference.
It was our first time a conference. Anyone who has never gone, I
HIGHLY recommend attending. It was an important experience for all
three of us (myself, dh and ds). Not only a place to reflect, connect
and grow but also a great opporunity to practice new aspects of yet to
be tried in a supportive environment.

I went to the link provided in the conference material
for "Connections" (see subject line above) but am not getting
connected. Can anyone provide the link again?

Thanks,
Joanne, Charlie, Kevin
Lake Carmel, NY
